name: Sneasel
flavorText:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.

previous.name: Heracross
previous.flavorText:
It is usually docile, but if it is
disturbed while sipping honey,
it chases off the intruder with its horn.

next.name: Teddiursa
next.flavorText:
If it finds honey,
its crescent mark
glows. It always licks its paws
because they are
soaked with honey.

pokemon.name: Sneasel
pokemon.flavorText:
Its paws conceal
sharp claws. If
attacked, it sud­ denly extends the
claws and startles
its enemy.

pokemon.name: Weavile
pokemon.flavorText:
They live in cold regions, forming
groups of four or five that hunt
prey with impressive coordination.

pokemon.name: Sneasler
pokemon.flavorText:
Because of Sneasler's virulent poison and daunting physical
prowess, no other species could hope to best it on the frozen
highlands. Preferring solitude, this species does not form packs.
